p.bold: The history of the TLV guidelines starts in 1971 (ACGIH, 2007). However, to the best of our knowledge, the study referenced in our paper is the only one that directly assessed the influence of the work exposure limits outlined in the TLV on core temperature responses during work and the associated changes in whole-body heat content.
